name: Assau!t
description:
Assau!t is a defense first person rail shooter. Assau!t is inspired by classic FPS and rail shooting games from the 90s.

The goal of this game is to survive for a long time from enemies approaching each stage.

Synopsis

It is 2084, the continent of UNAT where a huge civilization exists. Due to the unstable international community on the continent of UNAT, soldiers in black camouflage called counter-terrorist "anonymous" are causing armed terrorism.


You have armed yourself to avoid being beaten by anonymous forces. Will you ever survive the anonymous army for a long time?
